description: For example, integrating drawstrings in a plastified hem at each edge of sheets could be opened at time of disposal to gather up the sheet using these sterilized touch points.
summary: Use of disinfecting sprays (as is done on some airplane flights) or sterilized handle-tabs on bedsheets before disposal could minimize contamination during disposal.Simple (drawstring-like?) sterilized (bleach-drenched) handle tabs in plastic pockets which could be broken or velcro-ed open at the time of disposal could be integrated into bedsheet or gear design to reduce contamination of clean-up teams.The professional cleaners of appartment and hazardous materials must already have gear models to this effect which could be "tweaked" for hospital/treatment center use.
title: Improve treatment and disposal of hospital bedding /gear with preliminary disinfectant spray or sterilized handles before disposal to minimize contamination spread
